quoteText: e do this to improve services we offer you, including customized recommendations (for more information about Personalization feature, please read the Personalization FAQ), advertising and currency display, to improve marketing, and to track access and use of the NYT Services across the devices that you use to access the NYT Services.
title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes
